name: Initialization
description: Passage to initialize all game aspects.

components.imageDescription: Rain slicks the vibrant Haight-Ashbury street at night

lines: Rain slicks the vibrant Haight-Ashbury street

components.imageDescription: The silent entrance of the spiritual retreat
Overturned tea set near a figure in robes

lines: A life ended here, by poison

components.imageDescription: Body outline near overturned tea set in a sterile, opulent spiritual retreat office. Faint scent of almonds implied. Dramatic lighting.

components.mainTitle: The Poisoned Path: A Spiritual Fall
components.subTitle: Enlightened leader... or elaborate fraud? Kenji Tanaka, guru of 'Path of Enlightenment', found dead by poisoning. His message of peace silenced by violence.

components.imageDescription: Wide shot of Kenji's office crime scene. Police tape, scattered papers, overturned chair, and the tea set area are visible. Suggests disarray contrasting with the setting.

lines: Location: Kenji's spiritual retreat in Haight-Ashbury, a place of supposed peace, now a scene of death.
Method: Initial reports were vague, but toxicology confirms cyanide poisoning administered via sacred tea.

components.imageDescription: A case file open on a detective's desk, summary report visible, with photos of victim and crime scene.

lines: Victim Kenji Tanaka, spiritual leader of 'Path of Enlightenment', found dead amidst revelations of financial fraud.
The victim's legacy is tarnished, his followers are shocked and potentially ruined.
In a world built on illusion, how do you find the truth? Can justice exist when trust is shattered?

lines.text: Based on what we know, Detective, will you accept this case?

options.name: Accept Case
options.description: Take on the investigation.

options.name: REVIEW DETAILS
options.description: Review the case information again.

components.imageDescription: Close-up of a hand placing a red 'ACCEPTED' stamp on official case documents. The desk is illuminated by a single desk lamp, creating dramatic shadows. A police badge visible out of focus in the background.
A gloved hand placing a manila folder into a filing cabinet labeled 'PENDING'. The office is dimly lit with blue-tinted lighting. A clock on the wall shows it's late in the evening.

lines: Case declined. Returning to case selection.

components.imageDescription: Concept art of an investigation board with multiple paths.

lines: Martinez lays it all out—suspects, motives—overwhelming, right? Tune in—details coming.

lines.text: Suspect profiles available. Review suspects and evidence—choose your lead. Heavy decisions.

branch.description: Based on initial evidence and Detective Martinez's insights, which theory will you investigate first?

options.name: Pursue Lynn Pham
options.description: Loyal assistant or cunning manipulator? Embezzlement points to her—initial theory.

options.name: Pursue Andrei Soukupova
options.description: Ex-member with a grudge—revenge motive? Ostracized and ruined—proximity raises questions.

options.name: Pursue Alex Baccar
options.description: Ambitious disciple looking to ascend—disagreed with Kenji. Was Kenji an obstacle?

lines.text: <insert ADA response based on TOT personality>

options.name: Return to Crime Scene
options.description: Re-examine the guru's quarters in Haight-Ashbury

options.name: Interview Witnesses
options.description: Speak with individuals connected to Kenji and the organization

options.name: Review Suspects
options.description: Examine profiles and statements of persons of interest

options.name: Forensic Analysis
options.description: Check lab results for evidence (Toxicology, Prints, Digital)

options.name: Review Evidence
options.description: Examine all collected evidence

options.name: View Case Briefing
options.description: Review the full case summary and initial details

options.name: Check Objectives
options.description: See current investigation goals and tasks

lines.text: <insert ADA response based on TOT personality>

options.name: Return to Hub
options.description: Go back to main investigation view

lines.text: <insert ADA response based on TOT personality>

options.name: Return to Hub
options.description: Go back to main investigation view

lines.text: <insert ADA response based on TOT personality>

options.name: View Suspect List
options.description: See a summary of all suspects

options.name: Review Individual Profiles
options.description: Dive deeper into each suspect's background, motive, and alibi

options.name: Return to Hub
options.description: Go back to main investigation view

lines.text: Alright, notebook's open to 'Contextual Insights'--this isn't just about where people were, but *why*. Should we start with Kenji or Lynn? My hunch says it's... psychological! Think we'll find a hidden motive there?

options.name: Kenji's Psychology & Stress
options.description: Review hints about Kenji's state of mind.

options.name: Lynn & Kenji's Relationship
options.description: Examine evidence regarding their connection.

lines.text: Kenji's public face... hides something, right? These stress emails are intense--so much for enlightenment. Is it just me, or does something smell fishy? What drove him to the edge?

options.name: Examine evidence: Kenji's Stress Emails
options.description: Analyze the victim's recent communications.

commands.evidenceAlias: Emails from Kenji to Lynn show urgent requests for money and worries about auditors. He was under immense financial stress, contradicting his calm demeanor.

targets.evidenceAlias: Emails from Kenji to Lynn show urgent requests for money and worries about auditors. He was under immense financial stress, contradicting his calm demeanor.

lines.text: These emails... so Lynn was involved! Kenji's squeaky-clean image was just a cover for serious financial stress. Think this is more embezzlement than enlightenment?

options.name: Return to Evidence Review
options.description: Continue investigating with this new insight.

lines.text: Lynn and Kenji... close enough to plot, or just professional? Something about those pictures is making me nervous. Wonder if their relationship was more than just employer/employee. Is it suspicion, or just standard noir detective stuff?

options.name: Examine evidence: Security Footage
options.description: Review footage showing Lynn near Kenji's quarters.

commands.evidenceAlias: Security footage timestamped around the time of death shows Lynn entering and leaving Kenji's private quarters, potentially alone.

targets.evidenceAlias: Security footage timestamped around the time of death shows Lynn entering and leaving Kenji's private quarters, potentially alone.

lines.text: Footage places Lynn at the scene! Opportunity plus... Did she have a key? So many possibilities--maybe she did it. Or knew who did. What do you think?

options.name: Return to Evidence Review
options.description: Factor this relationship detail into your investigation.

lines.text: Opulence, yet something's sterile. Expensive tapestries, sparse furniture... Can't shake the feeling that something's off. You sensing it too? Where do you want to start looking?

options.name: Examine Desk Area
options.description: Look for documents or objects.

options.name: Investigate Wall Safe
options.description: See what the safe contains.

options.name: Inspect Tea Ceremony Nook
options.description: Examine the area where the tea was served.

options.name: Return to Investigation Hub
options.description: Go back to the main case view.

lines.text: Spiritual texts next to business docs? Odd mix. Sacred text with weird markings found tucked away. Think it’s important? Let's dig into it.

options.name: Examine Sacred Text
options.description: Look closer at the text and notation.

commands.evidenceAlias: A sacred text used in the Path of Enlightenment. Contains complex symbols and a peculiar, handwritten notation on a back page.

lines.text: Notation's out of place, almost like a code. Seems related to something hidden... Definitely note this. What's your read on the significance?

options.name: Note findings and return
options.description: Add this clue to your notes.

lines.text: A small, hidden safe. Needs a combination. Bet Lynn Pham, as his assistant, knew it. Something's important in here, what do you think we'll find inside?

options.name: Examine Secure Safe
options.description: Document the presence and nature of the safe.

commands.evidenceAlias: A small, high-security wall safe hidden behind a tapestry in Kenji's quarters. Access would require a known combination.

lines.text: Safe's the key, right? Could be poison or sensitive docs inside. Access points matter. Write that down. So, what are you thinking about this safe? I'm having trouble making a solid plan here.

options.name: Note findings and return
options.description: Add this clue to your notes.

lines.text: Ugh, overturned tea set... Poisoned tea was served here. Some forensic stuff, too. Let's take a hard look at the tea set. So, where should we start exactly, this is making me have flashbacks to past cases?

options.name: Examine Sacred Tea Set
options.description: Look for details, liquids, or prints.

commands.evidenceAlias: A delicate porcelain tea set, now marked by forensic powder. Residual liquid confirms the presence of cyanide.

lines.text: Forensic report... fingerprints match Lynn Pham on the tea set! Critical link—review the whole report! Does the location and volume of the prints mean anything?

options.name: Review Fingerprint Report
options.description: Confirm the fingerprint match.

lines.text: Toxicology report confirms cyanide! Timeline matches the private meeting. Pieces are starting to click, see. What do you make of it, boss?

options.name: Review Toxicology Report
options.description: Confirm cause and timeline.

lines.text: Tea set, fingerprints, and the tox report... Lynn's fingerprints on the murder weapon – poison at the scene! That's huge! I wonder why she'd touch the murder weapon? That is some key evidence, do you think?

options.name: Note findings and return
options.description: Add this critical clue to your notes.

name: Update Evidence Sacred Text Notation Found True
description: Automatically generated intermediate passage for aspect update.

description: Automatically generated intermediate passage for aspect update.

commands.evidenceAlias: Toxicology report confirming Kenji Tanaka's cause of death as cyanide poisoning. Traces found in the tea residue match analysis.

lines: River: "I've been digging into Path of Enlightenment for months. Smelled a rat with the finances."
River: "Talked to Kenji about it, even... and Lynn. She was always... guarded. Especially about the money."
River: "Saw her meeting Kenji the night he died... near his quarters. Seemed tense."
River saw Lynn at the scene.

components.imageDescription: Kenji's office, subtly chaotic. Kenji grips his robes tightly, a stress indicator overriding his usual calm.

lines: Days before his death, the guru's serene facade was cracking. Auditors were asking questions.
Kenji's office, subtly chaotic. Kenji grips his robes tightly, a stress indicator overriding his usual calm.

components.imageDescription: Lynn appears small, demure, but her hands tremble. Kenji leans forward, agitated, his voice rising.

lines: Lynn, his trusted assistant, stood across the desk. The discussion wasn't about enlightenment; it was about missing money.
Lynn appears small, demure, but her hands tremble. Kenji leans forward, agitated, his voice rising.

components.imageDescription: Close-up on Lynn's face. Her gaze darts, her jaw tightens. Fear warps her features.

lines: Kenji accused her, threatened exposure. Lynn's secret life, built on his corruption, was about to collapse.
Close-up on Lynn's face. Her gaze darts, her jaw tightens. Fear warps her features.

lines.text: Okay, here is the official dossier for Lynn Pham. She was Kenji's assistant and claims she left because he was being unreasonable during a financial discussion. Let's look through her details and see if her statement aligns with anything else we've found.

options.name: Analyze Lynn's Statement
options.description: Compare her statement to other evidence for lies.

options.name: Return to Investigation Hub
options.description: Go back to the main investigation view.

lines.text: Okay, let's analyze Lynn's statement about leaving Kenji's quarters. We need to identify the lie here. You have attempts left: {2 - $lynn_deduction_attempts}

options.name: She was with Kenji
options.description: Evaluate this claim

options.name: They discussed finances
options.description: Evaluate this claim

options.name: She left as soon as she could
options.description: Evaluate this claim

options.name: No Attempts Left
options.description: The puzzle is locked.

lines.text: Alright, let's verify your choice...

options.name: Correct Path
options.description: Hidden option for correct answer.

options.name: Incorrect Path (Retry)
options.description: Hidden option for incorrect answer with retries left.

options.name: Incorrect Path (Lockout)
options.description: Hidden option for incorrect answer with no retries left.

name: Deduction Puzzle 11 Lie Left Soon Intermediate 2
description: Automatically generated intermediate passage for action chain

lines.text: Processing action 2 of 3
You called it! Lynn's alibi about when she left Kenji—total smoke screen. The case is heating up—I can practically taste justice, but I'd rather taste coffee.

options.name: Continue
options.description: Understand the implications of the lie.

lines.text: Remember River's story and the security cams? Lynn's 'leaving soon' was a big, fat fib. Seems our girl wasn't in such a rush after all. Connect her timeline, see where she was.

options.name: Reveal Supporting Evidence
options.description: See the evidence that proves Lynn lied.

lines.text: Fresh intel just dropped into your case file—timestamps and a witness who's got sharp eyes. Get ready to dig in—this is big.

options.name: Continue
options.description: Proceed with the investigation.

lines.text: Your next step is your call—evidence or confrontation. Your choices, Detective. Make it count.

options.name: Review New Evidence
options.description: Examine the testimony and footage.

options.name: Confront Lynn Pham
options.description: Use this information to pressure Lynn.

name: Processing Actions
description: Automatically generated intermediate passage for action sequence.

lines.text: Processing action 1 of 3
Lynn's across the table. Now, what evidence do we throw at her first?

options.name: Present Alibi Evidence
options.description: Show the footage and testimony contradicting her timeline

options.name: Present Fingerprint Evidence
options.description: Show the forensic report linking her to the tea set

options.name: End Confrontation for now
options.description: Step back and gather more information, or pursue other leads.

lines.text: Caught in a lie—footage plus River's story says you lingered in Kenji's suite. Care to explain?

options.name: See Lynn's Reaction
options.description: How does she respond to being caught in a lie about her whereabouts?

lines.text: Your prints are all over the tea set, doll. Cyanide and all. Story?

options.name: See Lynn's Reaction
options.description: How does she explain her prints on the murder weapon?

lines.text: She's sweating. Claims confusion—a classic tell. Press harder or let her sweat?

options.name: Present Alibi Evidence Again
options.description: Remind her she lied about her timeline.

options.name: Present Fingerprint Evidence Again
options.description: Remind her about her prints on the tea set.

options.name: Present Decrypted Message
options.description: Deliver the final, undeniable evidence: Kenji's message.

options.name: End Confrontation for now
options.description: You have enough for now or need more evidence.

components.imageDescription: Decrypted message text displayed on a screen

lines.text: Strange markings on the sacred text… SAL thinks it might be code? Let's run some analyses, see if any messages come up—intriguing, right?

options.name: Start Decryption Process
options.description: Send the text for digital analysis

lines.text: Computer's working, algorithms running. Maybe this is a cipher from Lynn... Can't wait to see these decryption results! What about you?

options.name: View Decryption Results
options.description: See what the analysis found

lines.text: The notation decrypted! Message from Kenji to Lynn… ‘I know about the money. I’m going to the authorities—L.’ Oh no! This is BAD. What do you think it means?

options.name: Confirm Findings
options.description: Integrate this new information

lines.text: Message confirmed, added to the list! The puzzle pieces fitting together! This must be the reason for the murder!

options.name: Absorb the Revelation
options.description: Understand the full impact of this message

lines.text: Lynn did it! This message is the key! Lynn stole the money. Kenji knew. She silenced him to protect her crimes—Confront Lynn! Are you ready?

options.name: Confront Lynn Pham
options.description: Present the decrypted message to her

options.name: Review Evidence
options.description: Examine the new evidence in the app

options.name: Return to Investigation Hub
options.description: Go back to the main investigation view

lines.text: Processing action 3 of 4
Time to face the music—based on what we found, who's your pick for Kenji's killer? Need a refresher? Or ready to make the call?

options.name: Review Suspect Cases
options.description: Go through the evidence for each suspect one last time.

options.name: Make Final Accusation Now
options.description: Proceed directly to the accusation screen.

lines.text: Lynn Pham—financial motive, opportunity. Seems like our embezzling friend may have silenced Kenji before he could turn her in. Accuse or look at the others?

options.name: Accuse Lynn Pham
options.description: Formally accuse Lynn Pham of murder.

options.name: Review Andrei Soukupova
options.description: Review the case against Andrei.

options.name: Return to Final Accusation
options.description: Go back to the main accusation screen.

lines.text: Andrei Soukupova—revenge motive for past wrongs. Was in the area... but alibi's decent. Not seeing a murder weapon. Still suspect, or focus elsewhere?

options.name: Accuse Andrei Soukupova
options.description: Formally accuse Andrei Soukupova of murder.

options.name: Review Alex Baccar
options.description: Review the case against Alex.

options.name: Return to Final Accusation
options.description: Go back to the main accusation screen.

lines.text: Alex Baccar. Disagreement on finances. Had early access, but confirmed video places him elsewhere. Could he have paid someone? Stick with Alex, or look elsewhere?

options.name: Accuse Alex Baccar
options.description: Formally accuse Alex Baccar of murder.

options.name: Review Emma Sullivan
options.description: Review the case against Emma.

options.name: Return to Final Accusation
options.description: Go back to the main accusation screen.

lines.text: Emma Sullivan—felt cheated, stopped donating. Shaky alibi but we ruled her out. Means are still a mystery. Lean on Emma, or make a final choice?

options.name: Accuse Emma Sullivan
options.description: Formally accuse Emma Sullivan of murder.

options.name: Proceed to Final Accusation
options.description: Make your final choice.

lines.text: OK, detective, time to commit—we got Lynn, Andrei, Alex and Emma. Look at their photos—gut says who, and then point the finger.

options.name: Accuse Lynn Pham
options.description: I am certain Lynn Pham committed the murder.

options.name: Accuse Andrei Soukupova
options.description: I am certain Andrei Soukupova committed the murder.

options.name: Accuse Alex Baccar
options.description: I am certain Alex Baccar committed the murder.

options.name: Accuse Emma Sullivan
options.description: I am certain Emma Sullivan committed the murder.

lines.text: Lynn's guilty—justice prevails, right? Review the case details. You were amazing!

options.name: Read the Case Explanation
options.description: Understand how the crime unfolded.

lines.text: Lynn poisoned Kenji's tea—embezzlement exposed. What key evidence do you think cinched the case?

options.name: Review Key Evidence
options.description: See the evidence that led to the conviction.

lines.text: Fingerprints, video, finances—Lynn cornered! Finish up—what's your conclusion on the case?

options.name: Conclude Case
options.description: Finalize the investigation report.

lines.text: Lynn's imprisoned—retreat crumbles. Justice done—but a messy aftermath. What lessons do you take from it all?

options.name: Finish
options.description: Return to the main menu.

name: Update Case Complete Status
